description: This super easy slow cooker split pea soup is as comforting as it is delicious. With a hint of curry and loaded with veggies, it's a healthy meal you can feel good about eating.
name: Slow Cooker Vegetarian Split Pea Soup
recipeIngredient: Sea salt and black pepper (to taste)
For serving: naan or other flatbread

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients into a slow cooker.
Cook on HIGH for 4 hours or LOW for 8-10 hours.
Remove lid and stir well. Taste and add salt and pepper. Remove bay leaf.
Ladle into bowls and serve warm.
